com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
Class ProlTextInputStream

java.lang.Object
  com.igormaznitsa.prol.io.ProlTextInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProlStream, ProlTextReader
public class ProlTextInputStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProlStream, ProlTextReader

The class implements a text input stream which is used by a prol engine to read from an input stream.

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
See Also:
ProlStream, ProlTextReader

Constructor Detail

ProlTextInputStream

protected ProlTextInputStream(java.io.Reader reader,
                              ProlContext context)
                       throws java.io.IOException
A constructor (it is used by memory pipes so it is protected)

Parameters:
reader - a reader which will be used to read chars, must not be null
context - the owner context for the reader, must not be null
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if there is any IO error during the operation
